featured.text: They can cause electrical shorts, fires, and other damage to electrical equipment.
The electrical shock burned almost half of his body and melted layers of his skin off.
They appear to be attracted to electromagnetic fields and attack electrical insulation or wire connections.

definition.zh_def: 與電有關的，或涉及電力的。
definition.en_def: Relating to or operated by electricity.
definition.example: The electrical system in the house needs to be upgraded.
